description: [Taught by intensive mode over a 2 week period with assessment following after this.] The aim of this module is to: Identify the major components of the production system. Examine the techniques available to enhance production from both reservoir and well. Design appropriate procedures to ensure optimal initial production. Understand the process of delivering the reservoir fluid to the surface - consider the options available to safely and efficiently complete a well; understand the possible remedial work required when production from a well declines.
